response.original_title: Adam Savage Tours Peter Jackson's Movie Prop Collection
response.overview: Earlier in 2016, Adam Savage visited Peter Jackson in his cave--his world-class collection of props, costumes, and cinema artifacts that inspired him as a young filmmaker and continue to inspire him. Adam and Peter examine a prop you may recognize: the faceplate for the Hal 9000 computer from 2001: A Space Odyssey.
response.title: Adam Savage Tours Peter Jackson's Movie Prop Collection
